name: Westhaven
description: A bustling trading hub where merchants from across the realm gather. The town square bustles with activity as travelers, traders, and locals conduct business beneath colorful awnings.

npcs.name: Borin
npcs.description: A friendly dwarf who runs the general store in Westhaven.

points_of_interest.name: Town Square
points_of_interest.description: The heart of Westhaven where merchants display their wares and travelers share news from distant lands.

points_of_interest.name: The Weary Traveler Inn
points_of_interest.description: A cozy inn offering rooms and meals to visitors. The common room is always filled with interesting stories.

inn.description: Rest at The Weary Traveler Inn

exploration.description: A bustling town offers opportunities for social exploration and information gathering.

custom_activities.name: Gather Rumors
custom_activities.description: Listen for gossip and news around the town square

custom_activities.name: Network
custom_activities.description: Build connections with local merchants and residents

dangers: Some locals may be suspicious of strangers

investigation_discoveries: You uncover interesting details about the town's recent history.
